name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have a strong proficiency in **Java**, **SQL**, and **Machine Learning**, crafted to deliver high-performance solutions that meet business needs. My background includes robust problem-solving skills, focusing on designing scalable systems while adhering to best practices. My technical expertise encompasses full-stack development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, paired with significant cloud experience on **Azure** and **AWS**. 
I have successfully led projects integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, with hands-on experience in developing and deploying machine learning pipelines and applications. I excel in creating event-driven systems and have implemented CI/CD automation to streamline development workflows. I am well-versed in industry compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring that the applications I develop are secure and reliable. My ability to work remotely has allowed me to collaborate effectively with distributed teams, delivering results on time and within budget.
